name: Sheila
description:
'''Annie Chancel''' (born 16 August 1945), known as '''Sheila''', is a French pop singer who became successful as a solo [[musician|artist]] in the 1960s and 1970s, and was also part of the duo '''Sheila & Ringo''' with her husband singer [[Ringo (singer)|Ringo]]. She also fronted a [[disco]] act called [[Sheila and B. Devotion]]. Her stage name came from the title of her first release, a French [[cover version]] of "[[Sheila (Tommy Roe song)|Sheila]]", a hit by [[Tommy Roe]].

Throughout her career, Sheila has sold more than 85 million records worldwide.
